hotelInfo.name: Hotel Lahore City
hotelInfo.address: Lakshmi Chowk, Abbott Road, Montgomery Park, Lahore
hotelInfo.description: Hotel Lahore City offers a comfortable stay in the heart of Lahore. Located near Lakshmi Chowk and Montgomery Park, we provide affordable rooms with modern facilities, ensuring a pleasant experience for travelers and families.

reviews.name: Ali Khan
reviews.text: Good location and affordable prices. Staff was friendly.
